Comments_List: Concepts of procedures in high energy astrophysics, broader view on astrophysical topics, and skills to analyze spectra.

Powerpoints were filled with great information.  The project was a good demonstration of how the ideas are actually applied to research.  The organization of the course could be improved.  Sometimes the powerpoints jumped around or were given in a weird order.
I particularly like the range of topics it covered; However, the course can be improved by better organizing the context and highlighting the important points of each topic.
I will probably recommend the course to someone willing to explore his/her possibility in relative research, e.g. AGN, cosmic rays, etc.
